comment: th October1971 the IRA murdered David Tilbury, . of soldiers murdered in bomb attack on observation post, Londonderry. lb bombs were tossed over wall onto sandbag emplacement at back of Rosemount RUC station. Both soldiers died instantly
amr:
# ::snt th October1971 the IRA murdered David Tilbury, . of soldiers murdered in bomb attack on observation post, Londonderry. lb bombs were tossed over wall onto sandbag emplacement at back of Rosemount RUC station. Both soldiers died instantly
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / murder-01
            :ARG0 (m3 / military
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "IRA"))
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "David"
                        :op2 "Tilbury")
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG2 (s / soldier
                              :ARG1-of (m4 / murder-01
                                    :time (a / attack-01
                                          :ARG0 (b / bomb)
                                          :location (p2 / post
                                                :location-of (o / observe-01)
                                                :location (c / city-district
                                                      :name (n3 / name
                                                            :op1 "Londonderry"))))))))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 10
                  :day 19
                  :year 1971))
      :snt2 (t / toss-01
            :ARG1 (b2 / bomb
                  :quant (m5 / mass-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (p3 / pound)))
            :location (o2 / over
                  :op1 (w / wall))
            :destination (e / emplacement
                  :consist-of (s2 / sandbag)
                  :location (b3 / back
                        :part-of (s3 / station
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Rosemount"
                                    :op2 "RUC")))))
      :snt3 (d2 / die-01
            :ARG1 (s4 / soldier
                  :mod (b4 / both))
            :manner (ii2 / instant)))

comment: Please keep your language in check and avoid the insults to people.
amr:
# ::snt Please keep your language in check and avoid the insults to people.
(a / and
      :polite +
      :op1 (k / keep-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (c / check-07
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :poss y)))
      :op2 (a2 / avoid-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (ii / insult-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (p / person))))

# ::snt Stop calling people names!
(s / stop-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (c / call-01

            :ARG1 (p / person)
            :ARG2 (n / name)))
